mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RULE_NAME)) AS modelCount, COUNT (VERSION) AS modelVersionCount, RULE_TYPE AS ruleType FROM ( SELECT RULE_NAME, VERSION, RULE_TYPE FROM CRE_RULE_DETAIL WHERE IS_DEL = '0' UNION SELECT RULE_NAME, VERSION, RULE_TYPE FROM CRE_RULE_DETAIL_DRAFT WHERE IS_DEL = '0' ) GROUP BY RULE_TYPE

SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RULE_NAME)) AS modelCount, RULE_STATUS AS ruleStatus FROM ( SELECT RULE_NAME, RULE_ID, CASE WHEN RULE_STATUS = '0' THEN '2' ELSE RULE_STATUS END AS RULE_STATUS FROM CRE_RULE_DETAIL WHERE IS_DEL = '0' AND IS_HEADER = '0' ) GROUP BY RULE_STATUS

SELECT TASK_STATUS as status,count(*) as count from ( SELECT CASE WHEN TASK_STATUS = '2' THEN '4' WHEN TASK_STATUS = '-2' THEN '-1' ELSE TASK_STATUS END as TASK_STATUS FROM CRE_RULE_TASK ) WHERE TASK_STATUS != '6' GROUP BY TASK_STATUS
